acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This addition to the to the S. Philip Holt Papers was deposited 13 November 1974 by David J. Eood, et al for safekeeping and general historical reference.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This addition to the S. Philip Holt Papers, 1840-1938, consists of ninety-five items including correspondence, from 1849 to 1877, of Joseph Miller, Lucilla Wood, and M. A. Harper; Loose leaf business papers, from 1840 to 1914, taken from Joseph Miller's account book; a small stamp collection, from 1914 to 1937; a tinted litho print of the Peale portrait of Thomas Jefferson; and an unidentified photograph of a small girl by the Holsinger Studio.
